transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Amit Sharma ji baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Amit Sharma ji baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Ji nahi, Amit Sharma ka manager baat kar raha hu main, Prashant.
Executive: Main IndiaMART se baat kar raha tha bhaiya, mujhe assign mein ye number mila hai, expert assistant.
Customer: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Mera ek
Executive: Kis company se?
Customer: A to Z.
Executive: A to Z se baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: A to Z.
Executive: A to Z.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Aapke saath meri ek baar baat hui thi, hai na?
Customer: Nikhil Shivhare sahab baat kar rahe hain na sir aap?
Executive: Haan haan haan, us din shayad ji chutti pe the.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Ji. Wohi same bhaiya wohi cheez samajh nahi thi mere ko.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Jo past lead hai usme main leads aa rahi hain.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Woh unke, haan aur maine screenshot bhi leke rakha hai, ek lead thi nearby ki, zero second hua tha usko, phir bhi woh usme aa rahi thi past lead mein.
Executive: Aapke keh rahe the past call ho jaate toh woh past mein chali jaati hai, usko toh zero second hua tha post kiye hue.
Customer: Zero second mein past chali gayi?
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Main screenshot leke rakha hu uska.
Customer: Hmm, aisa nahi hai na.
Executive: Bilkul jaa chali gayi bhaiya.
Executive: Aur jo nearby locations ki lead hai woh bhi sab past mein jaa rahi hain.
Executive: Buy lead mein toh woh aa rahi hain jo nearby toh chhod do bahut door hain aur chhoti chhoti si leads hain.
Executive: 10,000, 20,000, 50,000 ki order ki leads hain.
Customer: Accha accha.
Customer: Accha past lead wala pehle hum log dekh chuke the, abhi past lead hum nahi dekh pa rahe hain.


Customer: Past lead wala pehle option aata tha mere paas.
Customer: Abhi kya dikha raha hai sir ye buy lead matlab ye stand stone ki hai, Kota ki hai, 1000 square feet ki hai woh sahi ho gayi?
Executive: Ye jo Kota ki hai ye ek, chalo 1000 square feet ki hai chalo uske baad toh sab chhoti, ye bhi chhoti lead hai 1000 square feet ki.
Customer: Ek ghante pehle aayi thi.
Customer: Ye GST verified lead hai sir ye.
Executive: Haan. Sir past lead mein jaoge toh usme hamare nearby aati hai, main dekha hai, Shadol ki aa rahi hai, Katni ki aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ye Niwa Hera ki taraf door hai?
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Ye jo ye location hai ek Niwa Hera karke.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Nimbahera.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan haan main sun raha hu.
Customer: Lekin woh ye Nimbahera kitna door hai sir aapse?
Executive: Nimbahera dikh toh nahi rahi mujhe isme.
Customer: Nimbahera Rajasthan 14 ghante pehle.
Executive: Nimbahera. Ye bhi sir koi badi lead thodi hai, 60 by 3 ka ek panel chahiye unhe.
Customer: Nahi quantity nahi mention hai na.
Executive: Woh toh nahi hai na, size dekh liya na maine, 5 by 3 ka hona chahiye ek model.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan, 18 square feet ka, 18,000 ka ho gaya.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Actually GST verified lead hai toh ek baar consume karke dekh lijiyega.
Executive: Kya? Aapko GST verified lead hai ye.
Executive: Toh GST verified hai na hamara.
Customer: Nahi ye lead ki baat kar raha hu sir ye valid GST verified hai. Toh ek baar main wohi keh raha tha ki ek baar valid consume karke dekh lijiyega. Kya pata kaam ki nikal jaaye, ye requirement matlab jisne post kari hai uske paas khud ki shop wagera ye sab cheeze hain ek baar.
Executive: Woh toh theek hai sir, main jo keh raha hu main aapko bataya tha na samasya ki past lead mein main leads aa rahi hain aur usme jo leads aa rahi hain bahut chhoti chhoti leads aa rahi hain.
Executive: Ji sir, aapne bilkul bataya tha mujhe.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Dausa se ek requirement jisme thi lekin bahut chhoti hai. Rose Shahul Kota. Ye Kota wali consume kari aapne?
Executive: Nahi sir, main 1-1000 wali nahi karta na consume, bata toh raha hu. Ye Kota wali jo 1000 square feet bhi chhota hai aapke liye?
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Accha. Aur Nimbahera wali consume kar lijiye sir, thoda sa pattern.
Executive: 1000 wala local se lega. Samajh rahe ho? Ya toh Jabalpur ka local ka ho, Jabalpur ka local ka 400 ka bhi hoga toh main kar lunga consume, 200 ka kar lunga main.
Executive: Samajh rahe ho? Ab woh Kota wale 1000 local se lega, usko chahiye puri gaadi 5000 ka main consume karunga.

Executive: Ji.
Executive: Filhaal is time abhi please please toh koi requirement nahi thi.
Executive: 1000, 2000 wala bhaiya nahi leta hai, local se leta hai, woh toh sirf rate ke liye post karta hai.
Executive: Hmm. Hmm. Main kya hai koi 5000, 10000 wala hoga woh gaadi ki gaadi jahan se material nikalta hai wahan se jaayegi.
Executive: Samajh rahe ho? Aur jo local ka Jabalpur se nearby ka hoga na main usko bhi consume kar lunga, Katni hai, 100 kilometer ki range tak main cover kar lunga, uski dikhati hi nahi hai mere ko, woh sab past lead mein dikhati hai.
Executive: Jabalpur ki ek lead aayi thi, do door frame chahiye the, woh maine consume ki, woh do door frame kitne ke pata hai aapko? 3000 rupaiya ke hain bas.
Executive: Ji. Phir bhi maine consume kar li kyunki maine Jabalpur ka hai laga lo phone.

Executive: Ji sir main samajh raha hu.
Executive: Kya keh rahe ho?
Executive: Abhi bhi meri, abhi jaise alert mein main jaa raha hu, meri puri 10 ki 10 bachi hain.
Customer: Sir aawaz thoda sa clear nahi aa rahi, main call kaat ke aapko dobara contact karta hu.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Main leads are showing in past leads.

- Nearby location leads are going to past.

- Buy leads show very far and small leads.

- Unable to see past leads option.



Resolution:

- Executive listened to the customer's concerns.

- Executive explained GST verified leads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back due to voice issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, past leads, gst, location
